title: Link (Hero of Winds)
content: A young boy from Outset Island who embarks on a journey to save his sister, Aryll. He wields the Wind Waker to control the winds.

title: Aryll
content: Link's cheerful younger sister. She gives Link her telescope as a birthday present before being kidnapped by the Helmaroc King.

title: Master Sword
content: The legendary blade of evil's bane. Found deep within Hyrule Castle beneath the sea. It requires the prayers of sages to restore its power.

title: Tingle
content: A peculiar man who believes he is a fairy. He maps the Great Sea and translates ancient charts for a steep price.

title: Outset Island
content: The starting location of the game. Home to Link, Aryll, and their Grandmother. Features a large lookout tower and a forest where the Helmaroc King drops Tetra.

title: The Wind Waker
content: A magical baton passed down by the King of Red Lions. It allows the user to conduct the winds and control certain objects.
